heading: Reels Performance Concern
body: The team's last 5 reels haven't been performing well. Kyle suggests adding an outrageous, attention grabbing hook.

heading: Q3 Budget Review
body: Marketing spend is 15% over budget due to the new LinkedIn campaign. We need to cut costs in other areas or request approval.

heading: Client Feedback: Acme Corp
body: Acme is unhappy with the turnaround time on the latest deliverables. They are requesting a meeting with the lead dev.

heading: Office Wifi Upgrades
body: IT is scheduling downtime for Sunday at 2am. No action needed, just an FYI for night owls.

heading: New Hire Onboarding
body: Sarah starts next Monday. Her laptop is configured, but she needs access to the repo and the design drive.

heading: Coffee Machine Broken
body: The espresso machine on the 3rd floor is leaking. Maintenance has been called.

heading: Competitor Analysis
body: Competitor X just launched a feature similar to our roadmap item. We might need to pivot strategy.

heading: Holiday Party Planning
body: Voting for the venue closes this Friday. Options are the Bowling Alley or the Rooftop Bar.
